data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Samara, Russia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samara, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Samara, Russia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 46,849 believers in Samara to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Samara an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Adyghe people. Make the Adyghe people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord we pray you unite the 46,849 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Samara.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Samara hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Samara.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

location.name: Samara
location.people_groups_list: Lezgin, Altai, Antsukh, Aghul, Aleut, Eastern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Lezgin (195,000), Altai (76,000), Antsukh (52,000), Aghul (35,000), Aleut, Eastern (500)
